title: Terminator-style liquid metal morphs into physical shapes
text:
Terminator-style liquid metal morphs into physical shapes 11:22am GMT - 01:06 
UK-based researchers have applied electrical charges to manipulate liquid metal into 2D shapes, bringing to mind the terrifying T-1000 character in the Terminator film franchise, which comes to life from a pool of similar material. Jim Drury reports
